0.0: When using an Elemental Skill, ATK will be increased by <cryo>12%</cryo> for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 25% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, a maximum of <cryo>150</cryo> ATK will be gained based on <cryo>2.4%</cryo> of the Bond for 15s. Bond of Life: Absorbs healing for the character based on its base value, and clears after healing equal to this value is obtained.
